programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.sub-title: Boles de picoulat et crème catalane
programme.desc: Boles de picoulat and crema catalana Jérôme Ferrer, born in the south of France, returns to the recipes of his childhood: boles de picoulat and crema catalana. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: Ô la belle vie
programme.desc: Nîmes: of women and Roman heritage From the 1st century AD, Emperor Augustus, adopted son of Julius Caesar, made Nîmes one of the most important Roman colonies in Gaul. It became the French Rome, radiant and prosperous, a splendour to behold. Two thousand years later, its heritage remains exceptionally well preserved. Presented by: Sophie Jovillard.

programme.title: Ricardo
programme.desc:
Beet cupcakes
Ricardo prepares a root vegetable for dessert: beet cupcakes topped with mascarpone cream and drizzled with beet syrup.
Presented by: Ricardo Larrivée.

programme.title: Académie française, voyage au pays des immortels
programme.desc:
With a touch of self-mockery, journalist and documentary-maker Serge Moati admits his dream of being admitted to the Académie Française. Not (yet) a member, he takes his camera to visit Quai Conti, a building dating back nearly four centuries. History, rites, customs, traditions and codes: the Académiciens reveal their secrets.

Directed by: Serge Moati (France, 2020)

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
The tiny house trend
Tiny houses are simply that, small homes in which certain people choose to live because they are very environmentally-friendly. Rocky and Lily are going to try building their own.
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: France
programme.desc:
Celebrity journalist of a twenty-four hour news channel, France sees her world turned upside down when she injures a pedestrian in a traffic accident. The young woman tries to withdraw into a simple anonymous life, but her fame relentlessly pursues her...

Directed by: Bruno Dumont (France, Germany, Italy, Belgium, 2019)

Cast: Léa Seydoux, Benjamin Biolay, Blanche Gardin

Genre : Dramedy

Awards: In competition (César Awards 2022, Cannes 2021)

programme.title: Capitaine Marleau
programme.desc:
Souls in anguish
Royan. An acquaintance of Marleau's is accused of murder. Alex Weller, renowned police officer jointly-appointed to the investigation, seems convinced of her guilt, but Marleau doubts his sincerity. Between illicit cigarette dealing, precarity and social revenge, there are plenty of motives amongst the inhabitants of a neighbourhood threatened with demolition.
Directed by: Josée Dayan (season 2, France, 2018) Screenplay by: Marc-Antoine Laurent, Jean-Marc Taba Cast: Corinne Masiero (Inspector Marleau), Arnaud Ducret (Alex Weller), Béatrice Dalle (Alice Le Drouin), Astrid Bergès-Frisbey (Eva Sallaberry), Mathieu Madenian (Pancho Ronsard), Caroline Proust (Sylvie), Adrien Dantou (Imanol), Sophie Mourousi (Lucie Mendieta), Guillaume Duhesme (François Mendieta) Genre: thriller

programme.title: Des racines & des ailes
programme.desc: Champagne: land of excellence Pascal Bourguignon photographs the classified vineyards of the Marne Valley; the Michelin-starred chef Arnaud Lallement opens the doors to his kitchen; Elsa Berthelot continues the age-old tradition of the "Compagnons du Devoir"; Champagne Avenue in Épernay, provides a showcase for the world's most prestigious wine merchants... Directed by: Mathilde Deschamps Lotthé, Myriam Elhadad (France, 2020

programme.title: Une autre histoire
programme.desc:
Episode 2
Anémone reflects on the best way to announce her diagnosis to her children. She also ends up plunging back into past memories: in leaving her physically abusive husband, she also left behind three children... Should she get in touch with them?
Directed by: Brigitte Couture (Canada, 2019) Cast: Marina Orsini (Anémone), Danielle Proulx (Lise), Sébastien Ricard (Vincent), Debbie Lynch-White (Caroline), Benoît McGinnis (Sébastien), Adam Kosh (Jean-Olivier), Mikhaïl Ahooja (Simon), Marilou Morin (Karla), Laurence Barrette (Olivia) Genre: drama

programme.title: Une autre histoire
programme.desc:
Episode 3
Anémone organises a dinner with the aim of announcing her diagnosis to her children. Sophie becomes closer to Naëlle, Simon's wife. Should he be concerned? Caroline welcomes her daughters to her new home for the first time, whilst Sébastien meets up with a former lover. ? Directed by: Brigitte Couture (Canada, 2019) Cast: Marina Orsini (Anémone), Danielle Proulx (Lise), Sébastien Ricard (Vincent), Debbie Lynch-White (Caroline), Benoît McGinnis (Sébastien), Adam Kosh (Jean-Olivier), Mikhaïl Ahooja (Simon), Marilou Morin (Karla), Laurence Barrette (Olivia) Genre: drama

programme.title: Les routes de l'impossible
programme.desc:
Armenia, the resistants of the Caucasus

At the crossroads of Asia and Europe, Armenia appears as an inaccessible fortress. 90% of its territory is over 1,000 metres above sea level and whole villages were completely devastated by an earthquake in 1988. Arman and his father confront the snow-covered trails to deliver provisions to the villagers.

Directed by: Julien Boluen, Jean-Christophe Brisard (France, 2019)

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 350 Alors qu'un nouveau vol a lieu à l'association, au grand dépit d'Alex, Christophe fait une découverte très douloureuse. Comment réagira-t-il ? Réalisation : Philippe Dajoux, Amir Shadzi, Chris Nahon, David Durca (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Chrystelle Labaude (Élizabeth), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Mélanie Robert (Manon), Naïma Rodric (Lucille), Aïssam Medhem (Akim), Shirley Bousquet (Laëtitia), Léonie Dahan-Lamort (Camille), Hubert Benhamdine (Christophe), Mathilde Jaillette (Johanna), Folco Marchi (Ludo), Benjamin Bourgois (Alex), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Jérémy Banster (Julien) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
